metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9774 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Remote Code Execution was found in Horde_Image 2.x before 2.5.0 via acrafted GET request. Exploitation requires authentication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-horde-image - 2.5.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-horde-image package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1').
